Module com.example.escritura_rapida
Package com.example.escritura_rapida.view

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
com.example.escritura_rapida.view.GameView
public class GameView extends Object
Represents the view layer of the game screen in the Fast Typing application.

The GameView class acts as a wrapper for all UI components used during gameplay, such as labels, input fields, and buttons. It provides accessors for these components so that the controller can update and manage the user interface.

This class follows the MVC pattern by keeping all UI elements grouped together in the view package, separated from the game logic (model) and event handling (controller).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ignacio Henao Henao

    • GameView

      public GameView(javafx.scene.control.Label wordLabel, javafx.scene.control.TextField inputField, javafx.scene.control.Label timerLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label levelLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label feedbackLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label scoreLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label validateButton, javafx.scene.control.Label restartButton, javafx.scene.image.ImageView returnButton)
      Constructs a new GameView.
      Parameters:
      wordLabel - the label showing the word to type
      inputField - the text field for user input
      timerLabel - the label showing the remaining time
      levelLabel - the label showing the current level
      feedbackLabel - the label displaying feedback messages
      scoreLabel - the label showing the score
      validateButton - the label acting as the validate button
      restartButton - the label acting as the restart button
      returnButton - the image view acting as the return-to-menu button
